lexUnit.name: bow.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a long, thin resilient object fitted with a string and used to propel arrows.

sentence.text: Roger de Merlay , however , interpreted his charter to mean that his woodwards might carry bows and arrows within their bailiwicks , and in September 1259 obtained judgement in his favour on appeal to the king .
